column1: Bugs recorded for MORSE v3 (12SEP05 onwards) -
Bugs#1:20 for earlier versions are here
<BLOCKQUOTE>F-NXTREC: Extra characters in input file beyond C*80: ...
when reading .lst file (for which records up to C*120 are allowed)
subroutine nxtrec.for which performs a check on records being LE
C*80. Now changed so that opnfil.for ignores this particular error
not overwritten when remainder of profile is replaced by subsequent file.
no. of profile levels that should be replaced.
Symptom: Isotopic profiles incorrectly set up if not explicilty
specified in .atm files (eg *O3 doesn't give correct isotope profiles
Cause: When setting default isotopic profiles each successive
profile was being reduced by factor 1E-6 (repeated ppmv to ppv conversion)
Symptom: Array bound error or other unpredictable behaviour
if microwindow with large number of irregular grid points used
Cause: No check if no. irregular grid points (NGRD) for microwindow
exceeds available array space (MAXGRD) in rfmsiz.inc (normally set to 5000).
Symptom: A Priori output represents a priori at start of
output each microwindow rather than only on the first microwindow.
